{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E8400 |revision=v1 |upc=745883720552 |asin=B01K31OEGQ |price=250 |serialnum_prefix=15910C |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |fcc_date=07/31/2014 |fcc_id=Q87-E8350 |ic_id=3839A-E8350 |type=wireless router, bridge |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3840BC |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABBEAH4:E |fla2=16 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |ram1_num=2 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W631GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port), |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=256QAM |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=LinksysXXXXX, LinksysXXXXX_5GHz |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=C0:56:27 |oui_eth=C0:56:27 }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2400 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-E8400/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E8400|pid=01t34000003X66bAAC}} According to [https://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=156231 ''Product comparison chart of EA7500, EA8500, E8350 and E8400''] from [[Linksys]], :E8400 supports wireless bridge mode but cannot operate as a wireless repeater/extender. This device is assumed to be identical to the [[Linksys E8350]] though no evidence of the E8400 is :obvious in current FCC docs and no image of E8400's label could be found to verify its FCC ID. The name was likely changed for marketing purposes. Details have been copied from E8350's page. ===Links=== *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=203431 ''Linksys E8400 AC2400 Dual-Band Wireless Router System Specifications'' on '''Linksys'''] *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=203430 ''Getting to know the Linksys E8400 AC2400 Dual-Band Wireless Router'' on '''Linksys'''] *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=156231 ''Product comparison chart of the Linksys EA7500, EA8500, E8350 and E8400'' on '''Linksys'''] :Specs are identical to the [[Linksys E8350]].
